thread.title: ‘Katti Batti’ without Kangana Ranaut! How that almost happened
thread.title_full: ‘Katti Batti’ without Kangana Ranaut! How that almost happened | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: ‘Katti Batti’ without Kangana Ranaut! How that almost happened
text:
Other Articles Kristen Stewart 'hates it' when people think she is unapproachable Kendra Wilkinson admits having 'lesbian' relationship in high school Farrah Abraham thinks she is 'bigger star' than Kim Kardashian Kangana Ranaut may well have missed ‘Katti Batti’, but for a call that forced her to have a ‘look’ at it.
Kangana Ranaut herself revealed she would not have signed the film had it not been for a very crucial call – from Salman Khan .
Kangana Ranaut says, “After ‘Queen’ I was flooded with women centric scripts. I wouldn’t have given a thought to ‘Katti Batti’. But when Salman Khan called up and insisted on me at least hearing the story, I had to give it a try. When I did hear the story, I didn’t take even a second to say yes. It’s an amazing script.”
Take the poll, tell us what you think:
Take Our Poll ‘Katti Batti’, the Nikhil Advani directed romantic-comedy that stars Kangana Ranaut and Imran Khan released today.
First Published on September 18, 2015 11:31 am
